name: Dungeon Slave
description:
-Story-

a teenager addicted to masturbation. One day, while having fun as usual, her erotic magazine started glowing and suddenly
found himself in a fantasy world. and appeared among the three beautiful busty female adventurers as
female holy knight Arla Rain, succubus Shena and elf Fiel winberrl, they explain to the youth that the world is in
the power of the demon king, and the way to save the world requires the power of a full potion (full potion is the power of a god who
able to heal and provide extraordinary strength), currently full potions are legendary items so they are very difficult to obtain,
But a teenager who has the power of the full potion in his semen he becomes the hope to save the world under his rule

-Character-


  • FIEL WINBERRL : shooting arrows with focus on the target deals great damage with the power of the wind fairy gives unlimited rain of arrows skills.
  • ARLA RAIN : female holy knight with the power of protecting comrades, slashing with a greatsword can hit mid-range target, with holy power creates an impenetrable barrier around her.
  • SHENA : a succubus with a scythe in his hand creates a dark aura in every slash, with the power of darkness inside him makes very deadly damage when near him

-Features-


  • Follow the story to earn rewards and upgrade your character. the missions will be random whenever you visit the guild master.
    Complete missions to increase adventurer rank.

  • Explore the dungeons of each floor, and defeat every enemy and boss to complete each mission received.

  • You can switch characters at the same time. if the character loses a lot of HP (Health points) you can visit the inn and do "Hentai" things and gradually the HP (Health points) will increase automatically.

  • The more you do "Hentai" stuff the more poses you'll unlock. Upgrade your character by exchanging the gold you receive from guild master quests.

  • Every character has a hentai scene there.

  • There are more than 20+ scenes from 3D to Live2D.

  • Each character has an obscene voice in every scene.

  • Specifically for 3D hentai scenes, you can rotate the camera and speed up the hentai scene by scrolling up/down.

  • Special Live2D Hentai scenes of different modes such as breast squeezing, licking, Orgasm/Cum, etc.
